# Chain Variable Transaction 83

## Changes

This transaction updates the following:

- `hip15_tx_reward_unit_cap` from undefined to 2.0
- `max_open_sc` from 15 to 25
- New oracle public keys, refer: [core#968](https://github.com/helium/blockchain-core/issues/968)
- Allow Controllino, Heltec, and FreedomFi to onboard hotspots, refer: [core#977](https://github.com/helium/blockchain-core/issues/977)

## Version threshold

None
